Key Match Events: Willy Adames and Gary Sánchez hit back-to-back homers in the first inning
William Contreras later added a two-run shot
Miscellaneous Highlights: Sánchez homered to left center (418 feet)
Contreras homered to right center (388 feet)
Ortiz doubled to left, Frelick scored
Others: The game was played at American Family Field in Milwaukee, Wisconsin, with an attendance of 33,603
